content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position(-17.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (-17.0, -50.0)) and a transport belt at position ((-16.5, -51.5))
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a transport belt at position ((-14.5, -51.5))
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -50.5)) and a transport belt at position ((-14.5, -51.5))
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -48.5)) and a transport belt at position ((-12.5, -48.5))

### Furnace at position(-10.0, -49.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (-10.0, -49.0)

### Chest at position(-16.5, -47.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (-16.5, -47.5) and a burner inserter at position (-16.5, -46.5)

### Belt Group at position(-17.5, -51.5)
Consists of a belt group with inputs from position (-17.5, -51.5) to (-15.5, -51.5) and outputs from position (-14.5, -51.5) to (-12.5, -51.5)

### Belt Group at position(-12.5, -46.5)
Consists of a belt group with inputs from position (-12.5, -46.5) to (-12.5, -48.5) and outputs from position (-12.5, -47.5) to (-12.5, -49.5)

### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when using inserter to insert items
  - Make sure there is a nearby entity that can accept the item being inserted
* Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
  - Ensure the tile is empty before attempting to place an entity
* Errors when trying to fuel burner entities
  - Make sure there is enough fuel in the inventory to fuel the entity
* Errors when trying to smelt items in the furnace
  - Make sure there are ingredients to smelt in the furnace

### NAMESPACE
* Defined functions:
  + `insert_item`: inserts an item into a nearby entity
  + `place_entity`: places an entity on the map
* Important variables:
  + `inserter`: an entity that can insert items into other entities
  + `burner_miner`: an entity that can mine resources
  + `furnace`: an entity that can smelt items
  + `chest`: an entity that can store items
  + `belt_group`: an entity that can transport items
  + `coal`: a resource used to fuel burner entities
  + `iron_ore`: a resource that can be mined and smelted into iron plates
